comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is a photo of HMS Hibernia and a Short Improved S.27 biplane, likely taken in May 1912, when Hibernia was engaged in various test flights conducted by Commander Charles Samson (RN) flying the aircraft from a makeshift flight deck placed upon the forward portion of the ship. The deck was removed from Hibernia after the trials were completed. See: HMS Hibernia (1905) - Early Career
